name: Memory.exe
description:
Ludum Dare 42: Running out of space

My first project where I did everything - programming and art, but also music! I am not a musician, so I went for an extremely minimalist style, and I think it actually turned out pretty good!

This game is a deceptively simple metroidvania that is complex in its design. This entire game is one big puzzle, and I highly recommend you take notes. Can you clear the memory?

Please Vote!: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/memory-exe

Online Link: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/715381
